message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CG, cs.CR 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the construction of high rate error correcting codes that are locally correctable with a sublinear number of queries. This falls under the domain of information theory (cs.IT) and distributed computing (cs.DS). The paper also involves the lifting of codes, which is a topic in computational complexity (cs.CC) and computational geometry (cs.CG). Finally, the paper discusses the error correction capabilities of the constructed codes, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR).
